  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/815</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/815</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">L'electricitat</string>
            <string language="en">Electricity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrizität</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'électricité</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Eletricidade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Elettricità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρική ενέργεια</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recurs amb animacions sobre electricitat. Conté els apartats següents:
- Electricitat
- Tipus d'electricitat
- Obtenció de grans càrregues
- La pila de Volta
- La bombeta incandescent
- El circuit elèctric
- L'origen de l'electricitat</string>
            <string language="en">Animated resource on electricity in seven parts: Electricity, Types of electricity, Achieving high charges, Volta's cell, The incandescent bulb, The electrical circuit, and The origin of electricity.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">fenomen físic</string>
            <string language="en">physical phenomenon</string>
            <string language="es">fenómeno físico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">física</string>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
            <string language="es">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lebhaftes Hilfsmittel auf Elektrizität in sieben
Teilen: Elektrizität, Typen von Elektrizität, Höhe Ladungen, 
Zelle Voltas, die weißglühende Birne, den elektrischen Stromkreis 
und den Ursprung von Elektrizität erzielend.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource animée sur l'électricité dans sept 
parts : L'électricité, types d'électricité, réalisant les 
frais de haute, la cellule de la Volte, l'ampoule incandescente, le 
circuit électrique, et l'origine de l'électricité.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso animated na eletricidade em sete 
porções: Eletricidade, tipos de eletricidade, conseguindo 
cargas da elevação, pilha de Volta, o bulbo incandescent, o circuito
elétrico, e a origem da eletricidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa animata su elettricità in sette parti: 
Elettricità, tipi di elettricità, realizzanti le spese di 
high, la cellula del Volta, la lampadina incandescente, il circuito 
elettrico e l'origine di elettricità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζωντανεψοντα στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς στην ηλεκτρική 
ενέργεια σε επτά μέρη: Ηλεκτρική ενέργεια, τύποι 
ηλεκτρικών ενεργειών, υψηλές δαπάνες επίτευξης, κύτταρο 
Volta, ο πυρακτωμένος βολβός, το ηλεκτρικό κύκλωμα, και η 
προέλευση της ηλεκτρικής ενέργειας.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">körperliches Phänomen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">phénomène physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fenômeno físico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fenomeno fisico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσικό φαινόμενο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσική</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
